price: Ardından da onu yetmiş arşın boyundaki bir zincire vurup sürükleyin!
arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma fī sil'silatin dharʿuhā sabʿūna dhirāʿan fa-us'lukūhu
